name: magichat
description: A magical question-asking hat, which will ask you and your friends questions via browser or CLI.

scripts.precommit: npm run format && npm run check
scripts.githook: grep -qxF 'npm run precommit' .git/hooks/pre-commit || echo 'npm run precommit' >> .git/hooks/pre-commit && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit

author: Evan Purcer
